# sheet2vcf

**Convert your contact numbers from Excel/CSV sheets into VCF (vCard) format with one simple command.**

---

## Overview

`sheet2vcf` is a lightweight and efficient Python tool that helps you export phone numbers from Excel or CSV files into `.vcf` format â€” ready to be imported directly into your phoneâ€™s contact list.

Ideal for anyone managing contact lists, marketing data, or bulk phone numbers.

---

## Features

- ðŸ”¹ Converts `.csv` or `.xlsx` sheets to `.vcf`
- ðŸ”¹ Automatically cleans spaces and dashes from numbers
- ðŸ”¹ Fast and simple â€” just one line of command
- ðŸ”¹ Works on all operating systems (Windows, macOS, Linux)
- ðŸ”¹ 100% open-source and free

## Installation

You can install it directly from PyPI:

```bash
pip install sheet2vcf
